info.name: Netvibes Dark Reloaded / night mode
info.description:
Based on the work of gazugafan with its Netvibes Dark theme (thanks to her/him!).
Works best coupled with a dark Netvibes theme, such as Blackmamba, Darkvibes (pictured), or Exposition Pepper.
Tested/made compatible with the following essential apps from Netvibes:
- Calculator (inverted colors)
- Calendar
- E-mail
- Gmail
- Google News
- Reddit
- Wikipedia
- Youtube Search
And more...



Feel free to contact me for comments/suggestions.
info.additionalInfo:
20161224-1112 - Added compatibility for some of the essential apps + description updated
20161220-1125 - Added an option to modify the link color for the Wikipedia Widget module.
20161219-2114 - Fixed colors after update from Netvibes team. Added the possibility to modify onhover colors. 
20161108-1 - Fixed Webnote app - writing color.
20161030-3 - Improvement: changed color for unread count on each tab.
20161030-2 - Improvement: changed title color for feeds with details (lisibility).
20161030-1 - Improvement: post date color has been changed for better lisibility
20161029-2 - Gmail app added
20161029-1 - Initial release

data.title: Good work, Reader Mode need a bit of TLC though
